p: Both B. robusta and B. yunnanensis leaf oils were rich in ( E)-caryophyllene (22.5% and 16.2%, respectively), Î±-humulene (13.4% and 9.9%), and bicyclogermacrene (8.6% and 8.4%). The leaf oil of B. robusta had a high concentration of germacrene D (20.3%), while B. yunnanensis oil was rich in 9- epi-( E)-caryophyllene (21.2%).
